ul.li: does not support recording the click action on test objects with the shadow DOM button object type. Some elements on shadow DOM cannot be detected by Selenium 3, so they might be unclickable. The workaround for this issue is to manually replace the Click keyword with the Enhanced Click keyword. See .

When using Record and Spy utilities, you cannot take screenshots of shadow DOM test objects. does not support the XPath and Screenshot locator strategies for shadow DOM test objects. We recommend using the CSS locator strategy only.
